availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: W. F. Bradford (Obion County, Tennessee, attorney and soldier)

body.p: Obion County, Tennessee, attorney and soldier. Tennessee native. Attorney in Obion County in 1860. Major in Bradfordâ€™s Battalion (mistakenly organized as the 13th Tennessee Cavalry and later renamed as the 14th Tennessee Cavalry) from 1863 to 1865.

ab.bibl: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Tennessee, of the Military Forces of the State, from 1861 to 1866 (Nashville: S. C. Mercer, Printer to the States, 1866), 639-638. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Obion County, Civil District No 6, p. 275.
